name: Doc Hudson
description: He is a 1951 Hudson Hornet, and is the mentor of Lightning McQueen.

name: Lightning McQueen
description: He is a a mix between a Ford GT and a sportcar, and is the main character of the Cars franchise.

name: Mater
description: He is a 1951 International Harvester Scout, and is Lightning McQueen's best friend.

name: Sally Carrera
description: She is a 2002 Porshe 911 Carrera, and is Lightning McQueen's girlfriend.

name: Sarge
description: He is a 1951 Ford F-1, and is the leader of the Radiator Springs Police Department.

name: Sheriff
description: He is a 1951 Ford F-1, and is the sheriff of Radiator Springs.

name: The King
description: He is a 1951 Ford F-1, and is the king of Radiator Springs.

name: Wingo
description: He is a 1951 Ford F-1, and is the owner of Wingo's Tires.
